short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces outgoing browser made requests with matching responses recorded in a .har file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces network requests with pre-determined responses from a uploaded .har file. The extension compares outgoing network request's signature: method, url and post data (if present) with the requests present in the har file, if the signature matches a request present in har file, the corresponding response is used to resolve the request.
